data.caption: Board Meeting Intimation for Board Meeting Intimation
data.news_body:
Indostar Capital Finance Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 13/08/2025 inter alia to consider and approve We wish to inform you that a meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled to be held on Wednesday August 13 2025 inter-alia:
(i)To consider and approve the Un-audited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) of the Company for the quarter ended June 30 2025; and
(ii) To consider and approve the Issue of Non-Convertible Debentures for an amount not exceeding INR 6000 crore in year through private placement.
(iii) To fix the date and time of convening the 16th Annual General Meeting (AGM) of the Company and to approve the Notice of the 16th AGM which inter alia includes the proposal (s) for (i) raising of funds by way of issuance of eligible debt securities.

data.caption: Corrigendum To The Limited Review Report On The Unaudited Standalone Financial Results Of The Company For The Quarter And Half Year Ended 30 September, 2022 Submitted To The Stock Exchanges On 8 November, 2022
data.news_body:
This is with reference to the outcome of the Board Meeting filed on 8 November 2022 regarding Unaudited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) for the quarter and half year ended 30 September 2022 prepared pursuant to Regulation 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015.

We would like to submit that there was an inadvertent typographical error in Limited Review Report on the Unaudited Standalone Financial Results for the quarter and half year ended 30 September 2022. In this regard, we enclose Unaudited Standalone Financial Results with revised Limited Review Report thereon for the quarter and half year ended 30 September 2022.

We confirm that there is no other change in Unaudited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) for the quarter and half year ended 30 September 2022 and other disclosures submitted on 8 November 2022.

data.news_body:
Dear Sir/ Madam,

We wish to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company at their Meeting held today i.e. Friday, 11 February 2022, inter-alia, considered and approved the Unaudited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) for the quarter and nine months ended 31 December 2021 prepared pursuant to Regulation 33 of the Listing Regulations.

Accordingly, please find enclosed herewith inter-alia the following:

a. Unaudited Standalone Financial Results for the quarter and nine months ended 31 December 2021 along with the Limited Review Report thereon at Annexure I and Unaudited Consolidated Financial Results for the quarter and nine months ended 31 December 2021 along with the Limited Review Report thereon at Annexure II;
b. Disclosures pursuant to Regulation 52(4) of the Listing Regulations for the quarter and nine months ended 31 December 2021 at Annexure III;

Request you to kindly take the above on record.

data.news_body:
We wish to inform that the Board of Directors of the Company at its Meeting held today i.e. Thursday, 12 August 2021 has considered and approved the following:

Please find enclosed herewith the following:

data.caption: Audited Financial Results (Standalone And Consolidated) For The Quarter And Financial Year Ended 31 March 2021
data.news_body: We wish to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company at its Meeting held today i.e. Thursday, 17 June 2021, inter-alia, considered and approved the Audited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) for the quarter and financial year ended 31 March 2021, prepared pursuant to Regulation 33 of Listing Regulations. Accordingly, please find enclosed herewith the Audited  (Standalone and Consolidated) Financial Results of the Company for the quarter and financial year ended 31 March 2021 along with Audit Report thereon and declaration in respect of unmodified opinion in the Audit Report(s)

data.caption: Outcome Of Board Meeting And Disclosures Under The Securities And Exchange Board Of India (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 ('Listing Regulations')
data.news_body:
We wish to inform you that the Board of Directors at its Meeting held on Thursday, 17 June 2021 inter-alia, approved (i) Audited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) for the quarter and financial year ended 31 March 2021, prepared pursuant to Regulation 33 of Listing Regulations; (ii) Issue of NCDs for an amount not exceeding INR 5,000 crore on private placement basis, during a year; and (iii) declared and approved payment of dividend due on 1,20,68,966 Compulsorily Convertible Preference Shares of face value INR 10 each, at rate of 10% p.a. on the issue price (INR 290 per CCPS) and fixed Record Date for the purpose of determining entitlement of CCPS holders for payment of said dividend as 17 June 2021.
Please find enclosed Audited (Standalone and Consolidated) Financial Results of the Company for the quarter and financial year ended 31 March 2021 along with Audit Report thereon, declaration in respect of unmodified opinion in the Audit Report(s) and other disclosures.
